explain: Neymar and Dani Alves displayed their loyalty to Barcelona by attending a basketball game between Barcelona and Real Madrid, which is one of the club's bitter rivalries. This showed that the two players are dedicated to the club and were willing to support their team even in a different sport.

2. Neymar, Alves, and Neymar's sister attended the game. This aspect highlights that Neymar and Dani Alves had not only dedicated their time and energy to Barcelona on the field by working hard during practices and matches, but they also showed their loyalty and commitment to the team by attending the all-important El Clásico match between Barcelona and Real Madrid on a weekday night, as well as bringing along Neymar's sister for the occasion.
The Euro League contest refers to the soccer match between Barcelona and Real Madrid, in which Barcelona emerged victorious.

Neymar's performance in a friendly match with Brazil against Chile indicates his contribution to the team's success. By scoring the only goal in a 1-0 win, Neymar displayed his ability to lead his team to victory. This emphasizes his value to Brazil and shows that he is a key player for the team.

One possible core idea of this aspect is that Neymar and Alves' dedication to Barcelona is evident in the fact that they chose to watch one of their biggest rivals, Real Madrid, play in a Euro League game beforehand. Even though they had the option to do something else or choose another team to support, they chose to witness a game that wasn't even played by their own team, showing loyalty and dedication to a bigger cause.

Neymar's dedication to the Barca team is evident through his actions which include hanging out with his team-mate Dani Alves to watch El Clasico, as well as attending a basketball game with his sister and friends at the Emirates Stadium, and helping Brazil defeat Chile in a Euro League victory.

Neymar proved his dedication to Barcelona by travelling to watch El Clásico on a Thursday night. Moreover, he also played for Brazil in a game where he had to withstand several challenges from Chile. This demonstrate his resilience and commitment to his club and country.
